name: Gambler's Earrings
description: After an opposing character is defeated: If the character this card is attached to is the active character, then ATK +2, heal self for 2 HP.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opposing character is defeated:</color> If the character this card is attached to is the active character, then ATK +2, heal self for 2 HP.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opposing character is defeated:</color> If the character this card is attached to is the active character, then ATK +2, heal self for 2 HP.
